altTitles.ja: ねこ、はじめました～ニャンとも気になるニャオ～

altTitles.ja-ro: Neko, Hajimemashita ~Nyantomo Ki ni naru Nyao~

description.en:
From the looks of it, Nao looks like an ordinary cat, but actually, there's a secret behind it! Nao, a high school student, had an accident and when he woke up, his soul was suddenly in the body of a cat! 

Just as Nao is about to give up hope of living in the cruel cat world, a girl saves him. But can Nao's soul return to his human body?

(Source: m&c! Comics, translated)

Official Release:
- French release by Nobi nobi as **Chat malgré moi** (2017)
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Cat Tales** (2018)
description.es: Kazushiro Nao es un chico de preparatoria cuyo accidente le ha provocado el borde de la muerte. Sin embargo debido a un suceso extraño termina viviendo en el cuerpo de un gato. Luego de varias situaciones acaba siendo adoptado por Chika-chan ¿¡Será este el comienzo de un extraño amor!?
description.id:
Dari penampilannya, Nyao terlihat seperti kucing biasa, tapi sebenarnya, ada rahasia dibalik itu! Nao, seorang anak SMA, mengalami kecelakaan dan saat terbangun tiba-tiba jiwanya berada dalam tubuh seekor kucing! 

 

Disaat Nao hampir putus asa hidup di dunia kucing yang kejam, seorang gadis menyelamatkannya. Tapi, bisakah jiwa Nao kembali ke tubuh manusianya?


(Sumber: m&c! Comics)
